text: Sony’s audio products are unmatched when it comes to overall quality, and while the Japanese electronic brand’s audio offerings are more widely known thanks to gear like the XM4 and XM5 headphones, a lot of folks might be pleased to know that it also offers more affordable products, such as the Sony SRS-XB100 Bluetooth speaker.
